RECORD.TEXT: 348301810 CTMC 65055310 421501 2/19/1991 12:00:00 AM Discharge Summary Unsigned Admission Date : 02/19/1991 Report Status : Unsigned Discharge Date : 02/25/1991 ENDOMETRIAL CANCER . OPERATION : Total abdominal hysterectomy , bilateral salpingo oophorectomy 2-19-91 by Dr. Lako Coma . HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS : This is an 81-year-old who presented with postmenopausal spotting and had an endometrial biopsy which was read at the Etearal Etsystems/ Hospital as showing grade I adenocarcinoma . PAST MEDICAL HISTORY : Negative . PAST SURGICAL HISTORY : None . MEDICATIONS : None . None . HEENT unremarkable . Pelvic exam showed a small mobile uterus . Extremities show no edema . LABORATORY DATA : HOSPITAL COURSE : The patient was brought to the Operating Room on 2-19-91 where she had an exploratory laparotomy , TAH / BSO , and omental biopsy . Washings were sent . Subfascia drain was discontinued . She will have follow-up with Dr. Lako Coma . YM263/3597 LAKO C. COMA , M.D. TH0 D : 02/25/91 Batch : Report : A5427C65 T : 02/27/91 Dicatated By : TA K.
